column6: It's the final battle before the war! Find out what you're favorite hulked-out heroes have been up to between the world-breaking events of WORLD WAR HULKS! The gamma-god of Thunder and a not-so-friendly Spider-Man are tearing up D.C. in a brawl of titanic proportions! Can the Asgardian and the wall-crawler overcome their savage impulses...or is it too late for these irradiated Avengers?! Rated T   ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Chris Eliopoulos | writer:Kieron Gillen | penciller:Jorge Molina | penciller:Patrick Scherberger
